lines.i: This class is used to alert providers of any risk of violent behavior posed by the patient. This class is used convey information about the violent tendencies of a client/patient in the context of protecting healthcare providers.

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] code with data type Violence Risk Type
Contains zero or more [0..*] historyofabuseorneglectrecord, where its type is History Of Abuse Or Neglect Record
